introduction.name: Bill Gates
introduction.about: Entrepreneur and businessman Bill Gates (born October 28, 1955) and his partner Paul Allen founded and built the world's largest software business, Microsoft, through technological innovation, keen business strategy and aggressive business tactics. In the process, Gates became one of the richest men in the world. In February 2014, Gates announced that he was stepping down as Microsoft's chairman to focus on charitable work at his foundation, the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation.
introduction.quote: "Don’t compare yourself with anyone in this world…if you do so, you are insulting yourself"

uniQualification: Drop out of Harvard University at 1973.
Law degree of Harvard University at 2007.

works: Worked as CEO of Microsoft from 1975-2014

introduction.name: Satya Nadela
introduction.about: Satya Narayana Nadella (/nəˈdɛlə/; born 19 August 1967) is an American business executive from India. He currently serves as the Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of Microsoft, succeeding Steve Ballmer in 2014. Before becoming chief executive, he was Executive Vice President of Microsoft's Cloud and Enterprise Group, responsible for building and running the company's computing platforms.
introduction.quote: Information technology is at the core of how you do your business and how your business model itself evolves.

works: Working as CEO of Microsoft since 2014
Working as architect of microsoft as well

introduction.name: Prakash Sain
introduction.about: Prakash Sain (/Pra' k ash/; born 26 September 1995) is an Software engineer from India. He currently serves as the Software developer (SD) of NTT DATA, after completing graduation. Before becoming Software engineer, he worked independently on php projects, including some feedbacks, and diary project.
introduction.quote: Information technology is at the core of how you do your business and how your business model itself evolves.
